subtitle: A bacon joint with tasty Chinese flavourings.

method.text: In a large ovenproof dish, combine garlic, ginger and salad onions.
In a jug, mix together the remaining marinade ingredients. Stir into the garlic and ginger mixture.
Weigh the joint and place in the dish. Spoon over the marinade until well basted. Cover. Leave to marinate in the fridge overnight.
Cook in the oven for 30 min per 450 g and 30 min extra, basting regularly.
Remove bacon and place on a warmed serving dish. Serve, brushing over any remaining marinade.

title: Salad onion and ginger roasted bacon
